R

RandomEventCard - Class in card
This class implements the Random Event cards of the game with their related rules
RandomEventCard() - Constructor for class card.RandomEventCard
This constructor is invoked to create objects from the class RandomEventCard.
RandomEventDeck - Class in card
This class implements deck of random event cards of the game.
RandomEventDeck() - Constructor for class card.RandomEventDeck
This constructor is invoked from the class RandomEventDeck.
removeMinion(Player) - Method in class card.Area
This method removes the minion of the player from the city area, and justifies the balance of stocked minions.
roll() - Method in class pieces.Die
 
runMainMenu() - Method in class io.TextUserInterface
This method implements an interactive interface to:
Choose one of the following:
1) n to start a new game
2) l to load a previously saved game
3) o for an overview of the current game's status
4) s to save the current game
5) q to quit the game
